listContexts.description: List all available workflows, projects, and knowledge bases from Flingoos

parameters.limit: Maximum number of contexts to return
parameters.scope: Filter by ownership: all, mine, or public
parameters.kind: Filter by type: all, project, or session
parameters.session_type: Filter sessions by type: workflow_recording or teaching_session

searchContexts.description: Search for workflows and knowledge bases using natural language queries

getContext.description: Retrieve a specific workflow or knowledge base by its ID

parameters.id: The unique identifier of the context
parameters.detail: Level of detail: summary or full

modifyContext.description: Edit workflow steps or knowledge items using natural language instructions

parameters.id: The unique identifier of the context to modify
parameters.action: Type of modification: modify, add, or delete
parameters.target_type: What to modify: step, phase, knowledge_item, or metadata
parameters.target_number: Step or phase number to target
parameters.change_prompt: Natural language description of the change

generateContext.description: Create a new workflow or teaching session from text content

parameters.name: Name for the generated context
parameters.project_id: Project to add the context to
parameters.visibility: Visibility setting: private, org:view, or org:edit
